Question.QText: A certain jar contains 80 socks 26 white, 18 black, 14 orange, 12 red, and 10 green. If a sock is to be chosen at random, what is the probability that the jelly bean will be neither orange nor green?
Which of the following numbers is farthest from the number 1 on the number line?
A particular stock is valued at $40 per share. If the value of a share increases 50%, then decreases 50% and then increases 20%, what is the final value of a share?
In how many ways can teams of 3 students be selected from a group of 7 students?
If it takes Eric 4 hours to paint the ceiling of a building and it takes Mathew 8 hours to do the same job, how long would it take to do the job if both painters worked simultaneously ?
If a, b and c are odd integers, which of the following expressions must be an even integer ?

The ratio of apples to oranges in a certain basket is 2 to 5. If 12 additional apples were added to the basket , the new ratio of apples to oranges would be 4 to 9. How many apples does the basket contain now ?
If 6 workers can build 4 cars in 2 days, then how many days would it take 8 workers to build 6 cars?
If 7 workers can build 7 cars in 7 days, then how many days would it take 5 workers to build 5 cars?
If n is an integer and 5^n > 4000000 what is the least possible value of n ?
If the perimeter of a certain rectangle is 70 and its area is 300 then what is the length of its shortest side?
. If the volume of a cube is x cubic feet and the total surface area of the cube is x square feet, then what is the total length, in feet, of all the cubes edges?
. If the area of an equilateral triangle is x square meters and the perimeter is x meters, then what is the length of one side of the triangle in meters?
In the xy - coordinate plane, the points (a,b) and (a + k , b - 3) are on the line defined by y = 2x - 5. What is the value of k?
. If points (0, -3), (6, 0) and (k , 10) all lie on the same line, what is the value of k ?
. If p and q are prime numbers, how many divisors does the product p^3q^5 have ?
